Timer Class Reference

A monostate class that contains all the time information to be used throughout the game. More...

#include <Timer.h>

List of all members.

 Timer ()
 ctor this will create a timer with a start time of SDL_GetTicks()

 resets the start time of the game to SDL_GetTicks()

Detailed Description

A monostate class that contains all the time information to be used throughout the game.
